bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part IX. The United States of America V.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1977, in fol., [v]-117 pp., ill.
Ch.L.A. IX, 357-406. - New Haven, Yale University (P. Dura, etc.); - New York, Pierpont Morgan Library; - Princeton, Princeton University.
C.R. par Günter Poethke, ArchPF 30 (1984) pp. 115-116. - A. Petrucci, Gnomon 53 (1981) pp. 136-139. - P. Spunar, Scriptorium 32 (1978) pp. 328-330.
